Eric Schmidt [ pictured] will step down April 4 and transition to the role of executive chairman. Co-founder Larry Page will take over as CEO. No real explanations were given although Eric Schmidt wrote in a blog post, Larry Page , Sergey and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making. Eric Schmidt has had a phenomal tenure. According to comScore, Google sites drove nearly 179 million unique users in November( behind only Yahoo) and Google generates 66 percent of all U.S. searches.
